SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc26
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.network

Interface VirtualMainController

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
VirtualRMIMainController, VirtualSocketMainController
public interface VirtualMainController extends Remote
This interface contains the method that can be called from the client. It allows the client to connect to the server and to create a new game. Finally, it delegates the control to a game controller.

  • Method Details

    • connect

      void connect(VirtualView client, String nickname, ClientState clientState) throws RemoteException
      Joins the new client to an existing game if there's any game with available player, otherwise it set the client's state to creator.
      Parameters:
      client - Virtual view representing the client
      nickname - client's nickname
      clientState - client's current state
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote method cannot be called

    • createWaitingList

      void createWaitingList(VirtualView client, String nickname, int numPlayers) throws RemoteException
      Initializes the waiting list of players and updating max numbers of players for the next game
      Parameters:
      client - Virtual view representing the client
      nickname - nickname of the player who is initializing the waiting list
      numPlayers - number of players of the next game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote method cannot be called

    • getVirtualGameController

      VirtualGameController getVirtualGameController(int id) throws RemoteException
      Returns the game controller if exists.
      Parameters:
      id - unique identifier for the game
      Returns:
      Returns the right game controller based on the id
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote method cannot be called

    • resetServerTimer

      void resetServerTimer(String clientID) throws RemoteException
      Throws:
      RemoteException
